title: Citadel Raises $1.25 Billion From US Bond Sale to Refinance Debt
description: Citadel LLC has raised $1.25 billion from a two-part US bond sale to repay debt, with the proceeds potentially also earmarked for general corporate purposes tied to its multi-strategy funds.
content: Citadel LLC has raised $1.25 billion from a two-part US bond sale to repay debt, with the proceeds potentially also earmarked for general corporate purposes tied to its multi-strategy funds.
